comment.author: 92598414@N03
comment._content: I do believe the gentleman with the walking stick and top hat who is called "H.E" for "His Excellency" is the Governor of News South Wales, Lord Augustus William Frederick Spencer Loftus. That would date the photograph between the 11th April 1884, when he left Sydney aboard the H.M.S Miranda, and the 30th April 1884 when he arrived back in Sydney.
